p.Students must satisfy each course's prer: Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 6 upper division hours used in: At least 6 upper division hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Mathematics.
This minor is not open to math majors.
li.MAC 2311C - Calculus with Analytic Geome: MAC 2311C - Calculus with Analytic Geometry I Credit Hours: 4
li.MAC 2312 - Calculus with Analytic Geomet: MAC 2312 - Calculus with Analytic Geometry II Credit Hours: 4

courseSection0.text:
Minor Requirements
A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in all courses used to satisfy the minor.
At least 6 upper division hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the Department of Mathematics.
This minor is not open to math majors.
Prerequisite Courses
Students must satisfy each course's prerequisites before enrolling in the class.
BSC 2010C - Biology I Credit Hours: 4
MAC 2311C - Calculus with Analytic Geometry I Credit Hours: 4
MAC 2312 - Calculus with Analytic Geometry II Credit Hours: 4

courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
BSC2011C - Biology II (4)
MAC2313 - Calculus with Analytic Geometry III (4)
MAP2302 - Ordinary Differential Equations I (3)
MAS3105 - Matrix and Linear Algebra (4)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
MAP4484 - Mathematical Biology (3)
MAP4494 - Mathematical Modeling in Biology (3)

courseSection1.text0:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
BCH4053 - Biochemistry I (3)
PCB3023 - Molecular Cell Biology (3)
PCB3044 - Principles of Ecology (3)
PCB3063 - Genetics (3)
PCB4683 - Evolutionary Biology (4)
courseSection1.text1: Additional courses can be taken as approved.

li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
li.Lower division courses do not substitute: Lower division courses do not substitute for Upper Division courses.
li.A minimum of 6 credit hours of upper div: A minimum of 6 credit hours of upper division (3000-4999) level coursework must be performed in residence in the Department of Mathematics at UCF.

courseSection2.text:
Total Undergraduate Credit Hours Required: 21


Other Requirements

Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
Lower division courses do not substitute for Upper Division courses.
A minimum of 6 credit hours of upper division (3000-4999) level coursework must be performed in residence in the Department of Mathematics at UCF.
